TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Enlistment extends System.Object

summary.span: 在交易的最後階段，協助登記的交易參與者與交易管理員之間的通訊。

span.span: Facilitates communication between an enlisted transaction participant and the transaction manager during the final phase of the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當和方法物件會叫用登記在交易中的參與者，它們會傳回此物件，描述登記。When the and methods of the object are invoked to enlist a participant in a transaction, they return this object describing the enlistment. 在交易認可的最後一個階段中，交易管理員將此物件傳遞給實作資源管理員登記在交易中的介面。During the final phase of the transaction commit, the transaction manager passes this object to a resource manager implementing the interface that has enlisted in a transaction. 具體來說，交易管理員便會呼叫 或參與者，根據是否後者已決定要認可或回復交易的方法。Specifically, the transaction manager calls either the or the method of the participant, depending on whether the latter has decided to commit or roll back the transaction. 參與者應該呼叫方法，這個物件可讓交易管理員知道它已完成其工作。The participant should call the method of this object to let the transaction manager know that it has completed its work. 可以呼叫登記方法在任何時間之前已呼叫它準備階段。An enlistment can call the method at anytime before it has called in the prepare phase. 如此一來，登記計算唯讀的票數，這表示它投票認可交易，但是不需要接收最終的結果。By doing so, the enlistment is casting a read only vote, meaning that it votes commit on the transaction but does not need to receive the final outcome. 請注意之後,呼叫方法時，已登錄的參與者接收來自交易管理員的任何進一步的通知。Note that, after the method is called, the enlisted participant receives no further notifications from the transaction manager. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面，以及當應該呼叫方法。The following example shows an implementation of the interface, and when the method should be called. [!code-csharp[Tx_Enlist#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/cs/enlist.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Tx_Enlist#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/vb/enlist.vb#2)]

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Done() cil managed

summary.span: 指出交易參與者已完成其工作。

span.span: Indicates that the transaction participant has completed its work.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在交易認可的最後一個階段中，交易管理員呼叫 ，或參與者，根據是否要認可或回復交易的方法。During the final phase of the transaction commit, the transaction manager calls either the , or method of the participant, depending on whether the transaction is to be committed or rolled back. 資源管理員應該執行任何所需完成交易，然後告知交易管理員它藉由呼叫已完成的工作方法`enlistment`參數。The resource manager should perform any work necessary to finish the transaction and then inform the transaction manager that it has finished by calling the method on the `enlistment` parameter. 如果資源管理員已登錄永久，但不會回應呼叫方法時，交易管理員不確定資源管理員已收到對應通知呼叫。If the resource manager has enlisted durably, but does not respond by calling method, the transaction manager is unsure that the resource manager has received the respective notification call. 因此，交易管理員會持續等候回應，以及維護與此交易相關資訊。As such, the transaction manager keeps waiting for a response, and maintains information relevant to this transaction. 如果是永遠不會呼叫，此項資訊是周圍無限期地保留在記憶體中或在整個系統資源。If is never called, this piece of information is kept around indefinitely in memory or in a system-wide resource. 這會導致無法回收資源。This results in resources not being able to be reclaimed. 如果是分散式交易，這可能最後會填滿中止 MSDTC 程序的 MSDTC 記錄檔。In the case of a distributed transaction, this could eventually fill the MSDTC log which halts the MSDTC process. 如果是交易受，這會導致記憶體耗用量，資源管理員的程序的漸進式且持續增加。In the case of a transaction managed by , this results in a gradual and continual increase in the memory consumption of the resource manager's process. 因此，很重要，您呼叫方法，一旦您的資源管理員透過您準備工作。Therefore, it is crucial that you call the method once your resource manager is done with your prepare work. 可以呼叫登記方法在任何時間之前已呼叫它準備階段。An enlistment can call the method at anytime before it has called in the prepare phase. 如此一來，登記計算唯讀的票數，這表示它投票認可交易，但是不需要接收最終的結果。By doing so, the enlistment is casting a read only vote, meaning that it votes commit on the transaction but does not need to receive the final outcome. 請注意，會呼叫這個方法之後，已登錄的參與者沒有進一步從接收通知之交易管理員。Note that, after this method is called, the enlisted participant receives no further notifications from the transaction manager.
